name: Small World, Eh?
description:
Small World, Eh?

Explore the environments in search of someone who keeps showing up wherever you go!

Look for this person!

Controls:

Click to walk

Click on the target character when near them to proceed to the next level

Credits:

Alex Saunders - Programming, Level Design

Jazzy Lightning - Art - https://twitter.com/JazzyLightning

and a Special Thanks to Ozbux for their help! - https://www.artstation.com/ozbux

This game was made for the Low Stakes High-Rolling 3 Game Jam.

Disclaimer: There is no loading screen, and it may take a while to load, but it should work!
